thread.title_full: UNWTO awards Hungarian film clip for featuring best tourist spotsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: UNWTO awards Hungarian film clip for featuring best tourist spotsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
UNWTO awards Hungarian film clip for featuring best tourist spots
“ Think Hungary – more than expected” the 2013 image film from Hungary has won the European prize at a competition to mark the 21st general assembly of the United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO).
The 2:19-minute film clip was produced with the aim of introducing Hungary’s most appealing touristic features – Budapest, Lake Balaton, conference and health tourism – to the broader international public.
The video, nominated by the Hungarian National Tourism Board, was one of the 51 contestants nominated for the prestigious competition, called by the UNWTO Regional Programme for Europe. The winners for each continent were selected by a professional jury, meaning that the victory means that Hungary’s image film has been named best in the European field. The award was handed over to Dr. Dorottya Gyenizse, representing Hungary’s Ministryfo for National Economy, at the general assembly held in Medellín, Colombia.
The following are the five regional winners:
Africa: Tunisia
The Americas: Ecuador
East Asia and the Pacific region: Macao (China)
South Asia: The Maldives
Middle East: Palestine
